short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows users to set a custom width for the SidebarContents element.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to change the width of the sidebar in Microsoft Loop pages so you can see full titles when you have deep nesting and/or long page titles that would otherwise be obfuscated by the hard limit currently imposed by Loop's CSS.
